description:
Eiichiro versus Alex. Alex feels threatened by Eiichiro`s note-taking during the match. However, Alex calmly responds to Eiichiro`s method and fights back by changing his play style. Unable to use the data he collected, Eiichiro`s decides to concentrate on reacting to Alex rather than thinking about strategy. Eiichiro`s movements improved the moment he realized he can trust his body to move instinctively.
Source: crunchyroll
